Title: Vengeance, Part 4
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Rhona Mitra, Rhashan Stone
Plot: El Soldat's forces are preparing to assault the farmhouse where Stonebridge, Scott, Markunda, and Othmani are holed up. Sinclair continues to question Dalton's command style. Karl Matlock continues to make inroads to acquire the triggers.
